question_title: Will the community prediction be higher than 26.00% on 2026-02-15 for the Metaculus question "Will the EU require mandatory age verification on social media or AI before 2027?"?
summary: The community prediction is currently at 28%, already 2 percentage points above the 26% threshold. The CP has shown a clear upward trend (24% → 28%) over the past two weeks, and the large forecaster base (770) creates stability. While Manifold's more skeptical 17% estimate could exert some downward pressure, the current buffer and positive momentum suggest the CP is likely to remain above 26% on February 15. The main risk is random fluctuation given the relatively close threshold.

factors.description: Current CP (28%) already exceeds 26% threshold by 2 percentage points - prediction is in YES territory
Clear upward trend: CP rose from 24% (Jan 19) to 28% (Feb 2) over two weeks
Large forecaster base (770) creates stability - hard for CP to move significantly without major news
Positive news momentum: France targeting Sept 2026, EU pilot programs, Ireland pushing under EU presidency
Manifold market at 17% vs Metaculus 28% suggests some smart money is more skeptical - could pull CP down
Threshold is relatively close (2pp buffer) - random fluctuation could push below 26%
